alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 02 at 4:25PM EDT until July 02 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN MADISON...NORTHERN SHELBY...HANCOCK...NORTHWESTERN RUSH...EASTERN JOHNSON...SOUTHWESTERN HENRY...NORTHEASTERN MARION AND SOUTHEASTERN HAMILTON COUNTIES... At 425 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles east of Fishers to 9 miles east of Lawrence to Greenfield to 14 miles east of Beech Grove to 6 miles northwest of Shelbyville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Anderson, Shelbyville, Fishers, Lawrence, Greenfield, McCordsville, Pendleton, Fortville, Ingalls, Knightstown, New Palestine, Morristown, Carthage, Shirley, Markleville, Kennard, Wilkinson, Fairland, Spring Lake and Boggstown. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
